Instructions



This is a website to practice penetration testing on.
It appears to be an online shop, however, there are hidden vulnerabilities.

The progress page has a list of challenges for you to exploit these vulnerabilities as well as hints and solutions if you don't know where to begin.
To complete a challenge, you must find a flag on this website. A flag is just a string of text that will look like: flag{some text}
Once you find a flag, copy it and paste it into the input box on the progress page.


As this is only a demo version of my project, there is only one user. The login details are
Email: guest@guest.com
Password: Password1


Use the sidebar to navigate around the website (click the 3 lines in the top left corner)
You may be prompted to log in.
